title: CAN I FILE A MOTION FOR THE COURT TO DEMAND PUB GUARD TO PROVIDE ME W HEALTH STATUS OF MY ADULT SON, TEMP CONSERVED?
question: My son was crippled in 2016, at 15yrs, in MVA, w/ acquired traumatic brain injury. He can't walk or talk, 'graduated' from home hospice 4 times. He was fine at home in my care. Never hurt, I'd handled ALL his cares and appointments, brain infection, PICC line antibiotics at home, hydrocephalus, then had an atty hired FOR ME Who sabotaged my petition instead of explaining the Assisted Decision option . I never was served or hinted that Pub Guard had petitioned for my sons Conserv. He was abducted from hospital room after security forced me to leave him alone just before he had a surgical procedure on his g-tube. I was escorted down and out on order of pub guard. Who ive still never met. Since then 9/17- I couldn't see my baby for SIX WEEKS. IVE only seen him twice, he is covered in bruises, starved, strap marks all over his thighs and bed sores covering his behind. He couldn't even pick his head up. He didn't have vital equip with him. 2nd time I went to see him I was arrested for a false warrant and released in 2 hours but told I violated ORDER,I can't see my son! wont say RESTRAINING order, I've not been served or told I had any order. My son is being murdered. He needs a dr!
